replace.target: No active connection to Kong Admin was found.
Activate one from the Connections page.
replace.expect: 立即设置 连接管理 页面.

replace.target: First of all, lets setup a connection to Kong Admin.
replace.expect: 首先,设置一个Kong的管理端

replace.target: Make sure your active connection is valid and Kong is up and running.
replace.expect: 请确认 连接管理 设置有可用的Kong并且是运行中.

replace.target: The API name. If none is specified, will default to the request_host or request_path.
replace.expect: API名称. 如果没有特殊, 默认为 请求域名 或者 请求路径.

replace.target: The public DNS address that points to your API. For example, mockbin.com. At least request_host or request_path or both should be specified.
replace.expect: 如果DNS地址指向你的API地址. 譬如, mockbin.com. 至少 请求域名 或者 请求路径 或者两者都指向.

replace.target: The public path that points to your API. For example, /someservice. At least request_host or request_path or both should be specified.
replace.expect: 如果路径地址指向你的API地址. 譬如, /someservice. 至少 请求域名 或者 请求路径 或者两者都指向.

replace.target: Strip the request_path value before proxying the request to the final API. For example a request made to /someservice/hello will be resolved to upstream_url/hello. By default is false.
replace.expect: 请求路径目录在代理的最终请求API之前. 譬如需要请求 /someservice/hello 将被解析成 upstream_url/hello. 默认是否.

replace.target: Preserves the original Host header sent by the client, instead of replacing it with the hostname of the upstream_url. By default is false.
replace.expect: 保留原 Host 主机头发送到客户端, 替换为 hostname 主机名 upstream_url. 默认是否.

replace.target: The base target URL that points to your API server, this URL will be used for proxying requests. For example, https://mockbin.com.
replace.expect: 基础的目的地URL指向你的API服务器, URL将采用代理请求转发. 譬如, https://mockbin.com.

replace.target: The API name. If none is specified, will default to the request_host or request_path.
replace.expect: API名称. 如果没有特殊, 默认为 请求域名 或者 请求路径.

replace.target: A comma-separated list of domain names that point to your API. For example: example.com. At least one of hosts, uris, or methods should be specified.
replace.expect: 指向您的API的域名的逗号分隔列表。例如：example.com。应至少指定主机、uri或方法中的一个。.

replace.target: A comma-separated list of URIs prefixes that point to your API. For example: /my-path. At least one of hosts, uris, or methods should be specified.
replace.expect: 指向API的uri前缀的逗号分隔列表。例如：/my path。应至少指定主机、uri或方法中的一个。

replace.target: A comma-separated list of HTTP methods that point to your API. For example: GET,POST. At least one of hosts, uris, or methods should be specified.
replace.expect: 指向API的HTTP方法的逗号分隔列表。例如：GET，POST。应至少指定主机、uri或方法中的一个。

replace.target: There are no notifications at this point...

pageDescription : "A certificate object represents a public certificate/private key pair for an SSL certificate. These objects are used by Kong to handle SSL/TLS termination for encrypted requests. Certificates are optionally associated with SNI objects to tie a cert/key pair to one or more hostnames.",
replace.expect: pageDescription : "证书对象表示SSL证书的公共证书/私钥对。Kong使用这些对象来处理加密请求的SSL/TLS终止。证书可以选择与SNI对象关联，以将证书/密钥对绑定到一个或多个主机名。",

replace.target: pageDescription: "The API object describes an API that's being exposed by Kong. Kong needs to know how to retrieve the API when a consumer is calling it from the Proxy port. Each API object must specify a request host, a request path or both. Kong will proxy all requests to the API to the specified upstream URL.",
replace.expect: pageDescription: "API对象描述了Kong正在公开的API。当消费者从代理端口调用API时，Kong需要知道如何检索它。每个API对象必须指定请求主机、请求路径或两者。Kong将把对API的所有请求代理到指定的上游URL。",

replace.target: pageDescription : "Manage Konga users and user roles"

pageDescription : "The upstream object represents a virtual hostname and can be used to loadbalance incoming requests over multiple services (targets). So for example an upstream named service.v1.xyz with an API object created with an upstream_url=https://service.v1.xyz/some/path. Requests for this API would be proxied to the targets defined within the upstream.",
replace.expect: pageDescription : "upstream对象表示虚拟主机名，可用于在多个服务（目标）上加载平衡传入请求。例如，一个名为service.v1.xyz的上游，其API对象是用一个upstream_url=https://service.v1.xyz/some/path创建的。对这个API的请求将被代理到上游中定义的目标。",

replace.target: pageDescription: "The Consumer object represents a consumer - or a user - of an API. You can either rely on Kong as the primary datastore, or you can map the consumer list with your database to keep consistency between Kong and your existing primary datastore.",
replace.expect: pageDescription: "Consumer对象表示API的使用者或用户。您可以将Kong作为主数据存储，也可以将使用者列表与数据库映射，以保持Kong与现有主数据存储之间的一致性。",
pageDescription: "管理API接口的健康检查点",
pageDescription : "有关节点的常规详细信息",

replace.target: pageDescription: "A Plugin entity represents a plugin configuration that will be executed during the HTTP request/response workflow, and it's how you can add functionalities to APIs that run behind Kong, like Authentication or Rate Limiting for example.",
replace.expect: pageDescription: "插件实体表示将在HTTP请求/响应工作流期间执行的插件配置，以及如何向在Kong之后运行的api添加功能，例如身份验证或速率限制。",

replace.target: "The Route entities defines rules to match client requests. Each Route is associated with a Service, and a Service may have multiple Routes associated to it. Every request matching a given Route will be proxied to its associated Service.",
replace.expect: "路由实体定义与客户端请求匹配的规则。每个路由都与一个服务相关联，并且一个服务可能有多个与之关联的路由。与给定路由匹配的每个请求都将被代理到其关联的服务。",

replace.target: pageDescription: "Service entities, as the name implies, are abstractions of each of your own upstream services. Examples of Services would be a data transformation microservice, a billing API, etc.",
replace.expect: pageDescription: "服务实体，顾名思义，是每个上游服务的抽象。服务的例子包括数据转换微服务、计费API等。",

replace.target: pageDescription : "Create connections to Kong Nodes and activate the one you want use.",
pageDescription : "Take snapshots of currently active nodes."
replace.expect: pageDescription : "获取当前活动节点的快照."

replace.target: will be saved and available for later import.
replace.expect: 将被保存并可供以后导入。

replace.target: Password and password confirmation don't match.
replace.expect: 两次输入的密码不一致.
MessageService.success("定时任务 " + ( item.active ? "开启" : "停止"));
MessageService\.success\(\`目标 \$\{target\.target\} 设置 \$\{healthy \? \'健康\' \: \'不健康\'\}\`\)\;

replace.target: A comma separated list of Server Name Indications. ex:
replace.expect: 服务器名称指示的逗号分隔列表.例如:

replace.target: List of consumers with access, based on ACLs & Auth plugins
replace.expect: 基于acl和Auth插件的具有访问权限的使用者列表

replace.target: This service is neither Access Controlled or secured with an Authentication plugin.
replace.expect: 此服务既不受访问控制，也不受身份验证插件的保护。

replace.target: The interval in milliseconds at which the Dashboard data will refresh. If set to 0, polling will be disabled.
replace.expect: 首页统计刷新的间隔（毫秒）。如果设置为0，将禁用轮询。

replace.target: If enabled, users will be allowed to sign up.
replace.expect: 如果启用，将允许用户注册。
